detachments.name: Boarding Strike
detachments.flavor_text: Space Marines excel in the sort of fast-paced, ferociously violent battles that erupt during voidship boarding assaults.

army_rule.name: Oath of Moment
army_rule.description: Select one unit to re-roll Hit rolls against.

detachment_rule.name: Drive Home the Blade
detachment_rule.description: Each time a unit shoots, if within 1 inch of an open Hatchway and every model is on same side, select enemy on opposite side. Weapons gain [SUSTAINED HITS 1] vs that enemy.

enhancements.name: Adamantine Mantle
enhancements.description: Subtract 1 from Damage characteristic of attacks allocated to bearer.

enhancements.name: Clavitine Reliquary
enhancements.description: In Movement phase, if within 1 inch of Hatchway, can operate it. Can only operate once per turn.

stratagems.name: In The Emperor's Name
stratagems.description: Target Battleline unit gains Feel No Pain 5+.

stratagems.name: Ceramite Bulwark
stratagems.description: Add 1 to Attacks and Strength of melee weapons. Must target enemy on opposite side of Hatchway.

stratagems.name: Duty and Defiance
stratagems.description: Fight on Death on a 4+ (add +1 to roll if Battleline).

stratagems.name: Vox-Amplified Roar
stratagems.description: Charge target must take Battle-shock test.

detachments.name: Pilum Strike Team
detachments.flavor_text: Phobos-armoured Space Marines wage a terror campaign to destabilise the target vessel from within.

army_rule.name: Oath of Moment
army_rule.description: Select one unit to re-roll Hit rolls against.

detachment_rule.name: Relentless Salvoes
detachment_rule.description: Units are eligible to shoot in a turn in which they Advanced or Fell Back.

enhancements.name: Omni-Structural Auspex
enhancements.description: After shooting, select enemy unit hit. Friendly models improve AP by 1 vs that unit.

enhancements.name: Void Warrior
enhancements.description: Re-roll Advance and Charge rolls. Can charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

stratagems.name: Knife Work
stratagems.description: Improve Strength and AP of melee weapons by 1.

stratagems.name: Enhanced Efficiency
stratagems.description: Can operate a Hatchway during a Normal or Advance move.

stratagems.name: Fighting Retreat
stratagems.description: When Falling Back, enemy in Engagement Range suffers D3 mortals (2-4=1MW, 5+=2MW).

detachments.name: Terminator Assault
detachments.flavor_text: The Imperium has no finer warriors for cleansing the claustrophobic decks of voidships than Terminators.

army_rule.name: Oath of Moment
army_rule.description: Select one unit to re-roll Hit rolls against.

detachment_rule.name: Sacred Oath
detachment_rule.description: Once per battle, select Oath target. Until next Command phase, re-roll Wound rolls vs that target.

enhancements.name: Seal of Indomitability
enhancements.description: Once per battle, bearer has 3+ Invulnerable save for the phase.

enhancements.name: Resolute
enhancements.description: Can charge after Falling Back. Auto-pass Desperate Escape. Move through enemies when Falling Back.

stratagems.name: Tower of Strength
stratagems.description: Add 1 to OC of unit until next Command Phase.

stratagems.name: Focusing Shrine
stratagems.description: Deep Strike > 6 inches away (ignoring walls) for Reinforcements.

stratagems.name: Carve a Path
stratagems.description: Move through closed Hatchway (opening it). Can charge enemies on other side if within 1 inch.
